creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: standing man seen from behind, turned 3/4 toward PR; man has long hair and wears long robe with patches skirt and long, flowing sleeves and fuzzy tall cap, and holds a book in his PR hand and a staff in his PL hand
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Untitled [wizard]
